name: Defend the Bread
description:
This was made for the GMTK 2022 game jam, with the prompt "Roll of the dice".  I interpreted that as having random guns to shoot against evil mice, since I was limited on time lol.  I wanted to make more loot for the game, but I ended up running out of time.  Ah well, maybe I can finish it up later and polish it up a bit lol

I also wanted to do a WebGL version, but Unity was being annoying and wouldn't import the audio when porting to WebGL...sigh.
